statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT recorded_at, temperature, humidity FROM sensor_data ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 70 AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE recorded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location, humidity FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 30 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM research_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT date, temperature FROM research_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM research_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE productivity_index > 0.8 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, humidity, soil_moisture FROM research_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, avg(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM research_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE impact_category = 'High' ORDER BY productivity_index DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensor_id, date, temperature, humidity, productivity_index FROM research_data INNER JOIN research_results ON research_data.sensor_id = research_results.sensor_id ORDER BY date DESC, productivity_index ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM climate_sensors
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM climate_sensors WHERE location = 'Farm A'
SELECT * FROM crop_data ORDER BY yield DESC
SELECT crop_name, temperature_optimal, humidity_optimal FROM crop_data WHERE temperature_optimal > 25
SELECT research_id, result, interpretation FROM research_results WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM climate_sensors ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM climate_sensors WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT location, AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM climate_sensors GROUP BY location
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE temperature_optimal BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY yield DESC
SELECT crop_name, yield, temperature_optimal, humidity_optimal FROM crop_data WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY yield DESC
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM climate_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT crop_type, yield FROM agricultural_data ORDER BY farm_id DESC
SELECT * FROM research_facility WHERE location='California'
SELECT result_id, research_date, finding FROM research_results
SELECT * FROM climate_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT farm_id, crop_type, yield FROM agricultural_data WHERE yield > 1000 ORDER BY crop_type ASC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM climate_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM research_facility WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location
SELECT result_id, finding FROM research_results WHERE research_date > '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM sensors WHERE location='Lab A'
SELECT * FROM data_records WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT data_description FROM project_data JOIN research_projects ON project_data.project_id = research_projects.project_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT record_id, temperature, humidity, date_time FROM data_records WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, affiliation FROM project_participants WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT project_name, data_description FROM research_projects JOIN project_data ON research_projects.project_id = project_data.project_id;
